name: cleaning_setMode
description: This function is used to set the cleaning mode of a vacuum cleaner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the cleaning mode.

parameters.name: predefinedCleaningMode
parameters.description: The predefined cleaning mode to set for the vacuum cleaner.
